title: [Large-scale] PBL-Based Mathematics Education Program for Engineering Practical Skills Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics and engineering concepts (high school level)
context.additional_context: Constructs real-world engineering problem-solving environments using VR simulations, facilitating collaboration and assessments via personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Mathematically model real engineering problems and propose solutions in a VR simulation environment.
Demonstrate collaborative communication skills during the problem-solving process through team-based PBL activities.
Perform mathematical calculations required in engineering practice (e.g., circuit analysis, biosignal processing) with 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
